sources.title: Atom Age Vampire (HQ)
sources.description: 1960 directed by Anton Giulio Majano starring Alberto Lupo, Susanne Loret, Sergio Fantoni, Franca Parisi, Roberto Bertea, Andrea Scotti and Ivo Garanni.  A scientist with a dark secret has developed a process for restoring scarred flesh.  Unfortunately, that process requires a “sinister supplement.”  This copy has been sharpened a bit.
